name: Cherry Horizon
description:
Cherry Horizon is a horizontal shooter in which you can gain kills to upgrade your "cherry blaster".

As Cherry, the determined pilot of a snake-like ship, you must blast through bugs and save the Grape Guardian. The game is inspired by 16-bit horizontal shooters and games by Treasure in particular. On the visual side of the spectrum, the visuals take a page from my love for simple vector art.

Controls-

LEVELS 1 and 2
WASD Keys - Move
Mouse - Shoot

LEVEL 3
W - Jump (Tap or Hold to preform a multi jump)
A and D - Move Left and Right
Mouse - Shoot
